FileFormat.FormatDescription: Brio Query File is a file format used by Brio Insight, an Internet Explorer plug-in for displaying reports generated from Brio business intelligence software. It contains a query that generates a client-side report from a server when executed. Brio Software underwent several acquisitions and eventually merged into Oracle's Hyperion performance management software.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration
